softwares.title: Umpire Scorecards
softwares.description: An online platform dedicated to measuring the accuracy, consistency, and favor of MLB umpires.

softwares.title: censaurus
softwares.description: A comprehensive, feature-rich, and user-oriented Python package that wraps the U.S. Census Bureau’s Data and Geographic APIs.

softwares.title: crec
softwares.description: A python tool built for retrieving, structuring, and enriching the Congressional Record, the official record of the proceedings of the United States Congress. crec wraps the GovInfo API — a product of the U.S. Government Publishing Office — with an intuitive and powerful API of its own.
